readable.title: 3201594926_cd2009eb13
readable.content: A girl wearing white polka dots and black boots walks and a woman in a blue outfit hurridly walks behind her . A hip young woman down the street with a woman in a kimono walks behind her . A woman in boots with a big purse walks down the street followed by a woman in blue . a woman walks with her big purse . Women walk down the street .
